Package com.ibm.ccl.soa.deploy.core.validator.pattern

Interface Summary
IDeployValidationActivePattern A pattern that can be found or constructed.
IUnitValidator Implemented by unit-level deployment validators.
 

Class Summary
AdditiveUnitDomainValidator Defines an "additive" UnitDomainValidator; that is, one which can be used to add additional validations to the units in a domain without repeating existing validations.
AdditiveUnitValidator An "additive" UnitValidator; that is, one which does not do much validation.
ConfigurationUnitValidator Validates ConfigurationUnit.
DeployValidationActivePattern Abstract implementation of IDeployValidationActivePattern.
DeployValidatorUtils Static validation utility methods.
UnitDomainValidator A domain validator which follows a pattern of delegating validation to UnitValidator.
UnitValidator Implements the CorePackage domain validations for a Unit.
